<Extension()> Public Function Create (operations As ITableOperations, resourceGroupName As String, accountName As String, tableName As String, Optional signedIdentifiers As IList(Of TableSignedIdentifier) = Nothing) As Table

static member Create : Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.ITableOperations * string * string * string * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.Models.TableSignedIdentifier> -> Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.Models.Table

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.
The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.
A table name must be unique within a storage account and must be between 3 and 63 characters.The name must comprise of only alphanumeric characters and it cannot begin with a numeric character.
List of stored access policies specified on the table.
Docs.summary: Creates a new table with the specified table name, under the specified account.
